context: Mid-size technology company expanding development team due to product roadmap acceleration, requesting budget for external recruitment agency services

request.purpose: External recruitment agency fees for hiring 12 senior software engineers
request.justification: Critical product delivery timelines require immediate team expansion; internal recruiting capacity at maximum

decision_process.outcome: Preliminary approval with cost optimization recommendations
Consensus on agency approach with performance guarantees

business_impact.expected_outcome: 12 engineers hired within 60 days, product roadmap accelerated by 3 months
business_impact.projected_value: $3.2M in additional revenue from faster time-to-market
business_impact.actual_value: TBD - to be measured at 6-month review

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Hiring completion rate, team productivity metrics, product delivery acceleration
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Revenue impact assessment, cost per hire analysis, retention rates
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: TBD - projected 180% based on accelerated delivery

lessons_learned: External agencies provide speed but require strong performance contracts; consider blended internal/external approach for sustained hiring needs
